contents.text: Welcome to Crunchbase in San Francisco, democratizing the way innovators find opportunity.
For subscription and support services, press 1.
For new subscription plans and pricing details, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details for a new Crunchbase subscription plan.
Ask about Crunchbase subscription pricing and available veteran discounts
Compare and evaluate API access subscription tiers and pricing structures for my developer team
Learn about pricing, plans, and available senior discounts for a new Crunchbase subscription.
Ask about student subscription plans and pricing for academic research on startup data.

contents.text: For help with your existing account and technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our customer success team.

navigationGoals: Fix a login error on my existing Crunchbase account.
Help recover my account login and update billing information
Troubleshoot an OAuth authentication error in my existing API integration
Get assistance resetting my password and accessing my existing Crunchbase account.
Resolve login and API access issues on my existing student Crunchbase account.

contents.text: For press and corporate inquiries, press 2.
For media and press inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our communications team.

navigationGoals: Obtain data and quotes for a press article on funding trends.
Submit a press inquiry to feature veteran-founded startups
Coordinate a media briefing on the platform’s capabilities for an upcoming tech article
Request the official media kit and press guidelines for an article I’m writing.
Request media relations support for a university newspaper feature on physics startups.

contents.text: For partnership and investor relations inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Discuss partnership opportunities and API integration with Crunchbase.
Explore partnership opportunities between my veteran support group and Crunchbase
Discuss a strategic data integration partnership to embed Crunchbase insights into our analytics product
Inquire about partnership opportunities and investor relations with Crunchbase.
Inquire about partnership opportunities to integrate Crunchbase data into my campus hackathon.
